content.question: Advocates of northern humanism believed which of the following?

choices.label: The fusion of Christian and Classical ideals provides the best definition of virtuous conduct.
The conventions of romantic love enhance social respect for women.
Education and scholarship should be equally open to men and women.
The new poetic forms, such as the sonnet, could be used to articulate their beliefs.
Political rights should be extended to all men.

content.answer: The fusion of Christian and Classical ideals provides the best definition of virtuous conduct.
